Html: Hey there all, just curious about target armor in the Cat module. Anyone change these values for certain bosses or is it static for all skull bosses?

Currently it's static for all skull bosses. RAWR 3's bosshandler will have a more dynamic approach to this though. We are currently in the process of updating the boss handler as well as adding information to T9 and T10 bosses. We have about half of the T10 bosses in place, and just need to get to the harder bosses.
